chunks.zh: 今天还有几个倒霉蛋还在上班？
chunks.en: How many unlucky people are still working today?
I'll go first, me

chunks.zh: 才腊月二十九啊，奋战到三十
chunks.en: It's only the 29th of the twelfth lunar month, fighting until the 30th
I feel offended

chunks.zh: 我，但是没关系，部门的都请假了，我可以假装出外勤出去玩，没有人会知道
chunks.en: Me, but it doesn't matter, everyone in the department has taken leave. I can pretend to be on an outside assignment and go out to play, and no one will know.

chunks.zh: 今天还上班偷着乐吧，我认识一个人因为业绩不好导致他领导天天被骂，昨天连夜被免职了，今天想上班都没得上。
chunks.en: Be happy that you're still working today. I know someone whose leader was scolded every day because of poor performance, and he was removed from his position overnight yesterday. He can't even go to work today.
I feel offended
I feel offended
I feel offended
I feel offended
Stop scolding, I'm here tomorrow too

chunks.zh: 你可以说我倒霉，蛋是你不能说我是个蛋。
chunks.en: You can say I'm unlucky, but you can't say I'm an egg.

chunks.zh: 这标题不好呀，2024 年有工作就该偷着乐吧！
chunks.en: This title isn't good. In 2024, you should be happy to have a job!

chunks.zh: 还有谁？？？？还有王法吗？还有法律吗？
chunks.en: Who else???? Is there any justice? Is there any law?
Stop scolding! The year-end bonus has been postponed!!!

chunks.zh: 坐标上海，16 号线 2 号线人还是满满的，本来有点矫情的心情被感染没了，大家都在努力生活！公司没多少人了，外面阳光很好，大大方方摸个鱼，然后开开心心期待假期，感觉其实还不错
chunks.en: Located in Shanghai, Line 16 and Line 2 are still packed. My originally slightly sentimental mood disappeared, everyone is working hard! There aren't many people at the company. The sun is really nice outside, so I can relax and slack off without a care. Then I can happily look forward to the holiday. It actually feels pretty good.
It's me!

chunks.zh: 没感觉自己倒霉，有地方吹空调，吃零食，喝饮料，领导不在，再摸摸鱼，还不用被催婚，比回家强。
chunks.en: I don't feel unlucky. There's air conditioning, snacks, drinks, the boss isn't here, I can slack off some more, and I don't have to worry about being nagged about marriage. It's better than going home.

chunks.zh: 您瞧您这话说的，什么叫倒霉蛋，我这明明是为公司站好最后一班岗
chunks.en: Look at what you're saying, what do you mean by unlucky? I'm clearly standing my last post for the company.
Stop scolding, I'm still working
